mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECEIVE(RECEIVE_CODE, RECEIVE_DATE, CREATE_IP, CREATE_ID) VALUES (#{receiveCode}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ,#{createIp},#{createId})
mapper.select:
SELECT RECEIVE_CODE, RECEIVE_DATE , MANAGER, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_IP, CREATE_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_IP, MODIFY_ID FROM RECEIVE
AND RECEIVE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{receiveCode}), '%')
AND MANAGER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{manager}), '%')
AND CREATE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createId}, '%')
AND CREATE_IP LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createIp}, '%')
AND CREATE_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND CREATE_DATE <= #{endDate}
ORDER BY RECEIVE_DATE DESC

SELECT PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_ITEM_NO, PORDER.PORDER_CODE, PORDER.STATE, PORDER_ITEM.MANAGER, ITEM.ITEM_CODE, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_COUNT, SUM(RECEIVE_ITEM.RECEIVE_COUNT) AS TOTAL_RECEIVE_COUNT, ITEM.UNIT, ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NAME, PORDER.CREATE_DATE FROM PORDER LEFT JOIN RECEIVE_ITEM ON RECEIVE_ITEM.PORDER_CODE = PORDER.PORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN PORDER_ITEM ON PORDER.PORDER_CODE = PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN ACCOUNT ON PORDER.ACCOUNT_NO = ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NO LEFT JOIN ITEM ON PORDER_ITEM.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE
(PORDER.PORDER_CODE IS NOT NULL AND (RECEIVE_ITEM.PORDER_CODE IS NULL OR RECEIVE_ITEM.PORDER_CODE IS NOT NULL)) AND PORDER.STATE = 'CMP'
AND !(PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_COUNT <= RECEIVE_ITEM.RECEIVE_COUNT)
AND PORDER.PORDER_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{porderCode}), '%')
AND ITEM.ITEM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{itemCode}), '%')
AND ITEM.ITEM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{itemName}), '%')
AND PORDER_ITEM.MANAGER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{manager}), '%')
AND ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{accountNo}), '%')
AND ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{accountName}), '%')
AND PORDER.CREATE_DATE >= #{startDate}
AND PORDER.CREATE_DATE <= #{endDate}
GROUP BY PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_ITEM_NO, PORDER.PORDER_CODE, PORDER.STATE, PORDER_ITEM.MANAGER, ITEM.ITEM_CODE, ITEM.ITEM_NAME, PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_COUNT, ITEM.UNIT, ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NO, ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_NAME, PORDER.CREATE_DATE HAVING PORDER_ITEM.PORDER_COUNT > COALESCE(SUM(RECEIVE_ITEM.RECEIVE_COUNT), 0) ORDER BY PORDER.CREATE_DATE DESC;
